Sentencas: New oxides of general formula Ln(2/3-x)TiO(3-3x/2) (Ln = La, Pr and Nd; 0.07 <= x <= 0.13) have been prepared by a new synthetic route, starting with precursors Ln(2/3-x)Li(3x)TiO(3) with perovskite structure.
Titulo: Synthesis and electrical properties of new rare-earth titanium perovskites for SOFC anode applications

Sentencas: Precursors were prepared by the ceramic method and a modified Pechini sol-gel process, and both were treated with nitric acid 2 M to exchange lithium ions by protons, leading to new phases Ln(2/3-x)TiO(3-3x) (OH)(3x).
Titulo: Synthesis and electrical properties of new rare-earth titanium perovskites for SOFC anode applications

Sentencas: These phases were calcined in order to dehydrate them and obtain the anion defect oxides Ln(2/3-x)TiO(3-3x/2).
Titulo: Synthesis and electrical properties of new rare-earth titanium perovskites for SOFC anode applications

Sentencas: All the phases showed perovskite-type X-ray powder diffraction patterns during the successive steps of the synthesis.
Titulo: Synthesis and electrical properties of new rare-earth titanium perovskites for SOFC anode applications

Sentencas: Anionic vacancy content was calculated by an indirect method, taking into consideration the metallic relation, determined by induced coupled plasma (ICP), and the absence of Ti(III), checked by electron paramagnetic resonance (EPR).
Titulo: Synthesis and electrical properties of new rare-earth titanium perovskites for SOFC anode applications

Sentencas: AC electric measurements carried out under different atmospheres (N-2, Ar, H-2/Ar, air and O-2) showed a conductivity increase under reducing atmosphere, due to the reduction of Ti(IV) to Ti(III).
Titulo: Synthesis and electrical properties of new rare-earth titanium perovskites for SOFC anode applications

Sentencas: Considering their electrical behavior, these new phases become candidates for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) anode materials.
Titulo: Synthesis and electrical properties of new rare-earth titanium perovskites for SOFC anode applications
Synthesis and electrical properties of new rare-earth titanium perovskites for SOFC anode applications
